name: Emoji Holidays
description:
Holiday Emojis are here!

Record your own special message to send to loved ones this holiday season.

Change your voice pitch and background for additional personalized customization.

Try it out today!

Emoji Holidays Subscription:
-You can subscribe for unlimited access to the premium Emoji Holidays content. Premium content includes more characters and removal of ads.
-Emoji Holidays offers weekly, monthly and annual subscriptions. The weekly subscription renews every seven days, the monthly every thirty days and the yearly every 365 days.
-Weekly subscription will be charged at $0.99/week.
-Monthly subscription will be charged at $2.99/month.
-Yearly subscription will be charged at $39.99/year.
-The prices are in US dollars. Pricing in other countries may vary and actual charges may be converted to your local currency depending on the country of residence.
-You will be able to access unlimited premium content for the duration of your subscription.
-Payment will be charged to iTunes Account at confirmation of purchase.
-Subscription automatically renews unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24 hours before the end of the current period.
-Subscriptions automatically renews for the same price and duration period as the original "weekly"/"monthly"/"yearly" package unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24 hours before the end of the current period.
-Account will be charged for renewal within 24 hours prior to the end of the current period at the cost of the chosen subscription (weekly, monthly, or yearly).
-Subscriptions may be managed by the user and auto-renewal may be turned off by going to the user's Account Settings after purchase.
-You can turn off the auto-renew for the subscription whenever you want through iTunes: https://support.apple.com/en-us/HT202039
-If you turn off the auto-renew, you will be unsubscribed when your current trial/subscription period expires.
-The current active subscription period cannot be canceled.
-After your subscription expires, you will no longer have access to the premium content.
-Any unused portion of a free trial period, if offered, will be forfeited when the user purchases a subscription.
-The prices are equal to the value that "Apple's App Store Pricing Matrix" determines as the equivalent of the subscription price in $ USD. All prices are subject to change without notification. We are unable to offer price protection or retroactive discounts or refunds for previous purchases in the event of a price reduction or promotional offering.
-We reserve the right to modify, remove, or replace any content for whatever reason.

Links to our Terms of Service and Privacy Policy can be found below.
Privacy Policy: http://www.makeovermaniastory.com/privacy.html
Terms of Service: http://www.makeovermaniastory.com/terms.html
